faq_entries.question: Can't find what you're looking for?
faq_entries.answer: Check out our Support section or email the IT Service Desk . Conestoga 299 Doon Valley Drive Kitchener , Ontario N2G 4M4 , Canada Phone : 519-748-5220 Documents are available in an alternate format Useful Links Top Questions Request a change to a website Report an IT issue Change or reset your password Contact Email: ITSDesk@conestogac.on.ca Phone: 519-748-5220, ext. 3444 Toll-free: 1-866-636-4718 Live Chat: Bottom right of the screen For more information, visit IT Service Desk Hours And Locations .
